direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing quote-related operations but perform different actions (inquiry vs. acceptance).
Both methods handle requests with similar control flows and parameter checks, focusing on different aspects of the order lifecycle.
Both methods access and manipulate trade-related data, though they serve different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: The quoteInquiry method must be invoked to generate a quote before it can be accepted.
Checking the order status after accepting a quote can help verify the state changes.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to order processing and can be used to verify expected outcomes.
